entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except easterly 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending before morning then periods of snow. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except easterly 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains this evening and after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 23 January 2023
